question: What specific technologies are being adopted by companies that frequently engage with their audiences on Instagram and have strengthened their data management capabilities?

subtasks.task: Identify companies that have a strong presence on Instagram based on engagement metrics. [CompanyInstagramDetail]
Determine which of these companies have recently improved their data management capabilities. [SocialMediaInfo]
List the specific technologies adopted by these companies. [CompanyTechStack]
Cross-reference the technologies with the companies identified in the previous steps. [CompanyInstagramDetail, CompanyTechStack]
